verses.verse: לַמְנַצֵּ֬חַ <S%H5329><s%> To the chief Musician עַֽל־ <S%H5921><s%> upon שׁוֹשַׁנִּ֬ים <S%H7799><s%> upon Shoshannim לְדָוִֽד׃ <S%H1732><s%> [A Psalm] of David הוֹשִׁיעֵ֥נִי <S%H3467><s%> Save אֱלֹהִ֑ים <S%H430><s%> me O God כִּ֤י <S%H3588><s%> for בָ֖אוּ <S%H935><s%> are come מַ֣יִם <S%H4325><s%> for the waters עַד־ <S%H5704><s%> against נָֽפֶשׁ׃ <S%H5315><s%> in unto [my] soul

טָבַ֤עְתִּי ׀ <S%H2883><s%> I sink בִּיוֵ֣ן <S%H3121><s%> mire מְ֭צוּלָה <S%H4688><s%> in deep וְאֵ֣ין <S%H369><s%> and there מָעֳמָ֑ד <S%H4613><s%> where [there is] no standing בָּ֥אתִי <S%H935><s%> I am come בְמַעֲמַקֵּי־ <S%H4615><s%> into deep מַ֝֗יִם <S%H4325><s%> waters וְשִׁבֹּ֥לֶת <S%H7641><s%> where the floods שְׁטָפָֽתְנִי׃ <S%H7857><s%> overflow

יָגַ֣עְתִּי <S%H3021><s%> I am weary בְקָרְאִי֮ <S%H7121><s%> of my crying נִחַ֪ר <S%H2787><s%> is dried גְּר֫וֹנִ֥י <S%H1627><s%> my throat כָּל֥וּ <S%H3615><s%> fail עֵינַ֑י <S%H5869><s%> mine eyes מְ֝יַחֵ֗ל <S%H3176><s%> while I wait לֵאלֹהָֽי׃ <S%H430><s%> for my God

רַבּ֤וּ ׀ <S%H7231><s%> are more מִשַּׂעֲר֣וֹת <S%H8185><s%> than the hairs רֹאשִׁי֮ <S%H7218><s%> of mine head שֹׂנְאַ֪י <S%H8130><s%> They that hate חִ֫נָּ֥ם <S%H2600><s%> me without a cause עָצְמ֣וּ <S%H6105><s%> are mighty מַ֭צְמִיתַי <S%H6789><s%> they that would destroy אֹיְבַ֣י <S%H341><s%> me [being] mine enemies שֶׁ֑קֶר <S%H8267><s%> wrongfully אֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> What לֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> did not גָ֝זַ֗לְתִּי <S%H1497><s%> [that] which I took not away אָ֣ז <S%H227><s%> then אָשִֽׁיב׃ <S%H7725><s%> then I restored

אֱ‍ֽלֹהִ֗ים <S%H430><s%> O God אַתָּ֣ה <S%H859><s%> who יָ֭דַעְתָּ <S%H3045><s%> thou knowest לְאִוַּלְתִּ֑י <S%H200><s%> my foolishness וְ֝אַשְׁמוֹתַ֗י <S%H819><s%> and my sins מִמְּךָ֥ <S%H4480><s%> at לֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> are not נִכְחָֽדוּ׃ <S%H3582><s%> are not hid

אַל־ <S%H408><s%> not יֵ֘בֹ֤שׁוּ <S%H954><s%> be ashamed בִ֨י ׀ קֹוֶיךָ֮ <S%H6960><s%> Let not them that wait אֲדֹנָ֥י <S%H136><s%> on thee O Lord יְהוִ֗ה <S%H3069><s%> GOD צְבָ֫א֥וֹת <S%H6635><s%> of hosts אַל־ <S%H408><s%> nay יִכָּ֣לְמוּ <S%H3637><s%> thee be confounded בִ֣י מְבַקְשֶׁ֑יךָ <S%H1245><s%> for my sake let not those that seek אֱ֝לֹהֵ֗י <S%H430><s%> for my sake O God יִשְׂרָאֵֽל׃ <S%H3478><s%> of Israel

כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> Because עָ֭לֶיךָ <S%H5921><s%> your sake נָשָׂ֣אתִי <S%H5375><s%> Because for thy sake I have borne חֶרְפָּ֑ה <S%H2781><s%> reproach כִּסְּתָ֖ה <S%H3680><s%> hath covered כְלִמָּ֣ה <S%H3639><s%> shame פָנָֽי׃ <S%H6440><s%> my face

מ֭וּזָר <S%H2114><s%> I am become a stranger הָיִ֣יתִי <S%H1961><s%> have לְאֶחָ֑י <S%H251><s%> unto my brethren וְ֝נָכְרִ֗י <S%H5237><s%> and an alien לִבְנֵ֥י <S%H1121><s%> children אִמִּֽי׃ <S%H517><s%> unto my mother's

כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> For קִנְאַ֣ת <S%H7068><s%> For the zeal בֵּיתְךָ֣ <S%H1004><s%> of thine house אֲכָלָ֑תְנִי <S%H398><s%> hath eaten me up וְחֶרְפּ֥וֹת <S%H2781><s%> and the reproaches ח֝וֹרְפֶ֗יךָ <S%H2778><s%> of them that reproached נָפְל֥וּ <S%H5307><s%> thee are fallen עָלָֽי׃ <S%H5921><s%> and

וָאֶבְכֶּ֣ה <S%H1058><s%> When I wept בַצּ֣וֹם <S%H6685><s%> with fasting נַפְשִׁ֑י <S%H5315><s%> [and chastened] my soul וַתְּהִ֖י <S%H1961><s%> became לַחֲרָפ֣וֹת <S%H2781><s%> that was to my reproach לִֽי׃

וָאֶתְּנָ֣ה <S%H5414><s%> I made לְבוּשִׁ֣י <S%H3830><s%> also my garment שָׂ֑ק <S%H8242><s%> sackcloth וָאֱהִ֖י <S%H1961><s%> became לָהֶ֣ם <S%H1992><s%> like לְמָשָֽׁל׃ <S%H4912><s%> and I became a proverb

יָשִׂ֣יחוּ <S%H7878><s%> speak בִ֭י יֹ֣שְׁבֵי <S%H3427><s%> They that sit in שָׁ֑עַר <S%H8179><s%> the gate וּ֝נְגִינ֗וֹת <S%H5058><s%> against me and I [was] the song שׁוֹתֵ֥י <S%H8354><s%> assuredly שֵׁכָֽר׃ <S%H7941><s%> strong drink

וַאֲנִ֤י <S%H589><s%> Me תְפִלָּתִֽי־ <S%H8605><s%> But as for me my prayer לְךָ֨ ׀ יְהוָ֡ה <S%H3068><s%> [is] unto thee O LORD עֵ֤ת <S%H6256><s%> time רָצ֗וֹן <S%H7522><s%> [in] an acceptable אֱלֹהִ֥ים <S%H430><s%> O God בְּרָב־ <S%H7230><s%> in the multitude חַסְדֶּ֑ךָ <S%H2617><s%> of thy mercy עֲ֝נֵ֗נִי <S%H6030><s%> hear בֶּאֱמֶ֥ת <S%H571><s%> me in the truth יִשְׁעֶֽךָ׃ <S%H3468><s%> of thy salvation

הַצִּילֵ֣נִי <S%H5337><s%> Deliver מִ֭טִּיט <S%H2916><s%> me out of the mire וְאַל־ <S%H408><s%> not אֶטְבָּ֑עָה <S%H2883><s%> and let me not sink אִנָּצְלָ֥ה <S%H5337><s%> let me be delivered מִ֝שֹּֽׂנְאַ֗י <S%H8130><s%> from them that hate וּמִמַּֽעֲמַקֵּי־ <S%H4615><s%> me and out of the deep מָֽיִם׃ <S%H4325><s%> waters

אַל־ <S%H408><s%> Nor תִּשְׁטְפֵ֤נִי ׀ <S%H7857><s%> overflow שִׁבֹּ֣לֶת <S%H7641><s%> branch מַ֭יִם <S%H4325><s%> of water וְאַל־ <S%H408><s%> Nor תִּבְלָעֵ֣נִי <S%H1104><s%> swallow me up מְצוּלָ֑ה <S%H4688><s%> me neither let the deep וְאַל־ <S%H408><s%> Nor תֶּאְטַר־ <S%H332><s%> shut עָלַ֖י <S%H5921><s%> and בְּאֵ֣ר <S%H875><s%> and let not the pit פִּֽיהָ׃ <S%H6310><s%> her mouth

עֲנֵ֣נִי <S%H6030><s%> Hear יְ֭הוָה <S%H3068><s%> me O LORD כִּי־ <S%H3588><s%> for ט֣וֹב <S%H2896><s%> [is] good חַסְדֶּ֑ךָ <S%H2617><s%> for thy lovingkindness כְּרֹ֥ב <S%H7230><s%> unto me according to the multitude רַ֝חֲמֶ֗יךָ <S%H7356><s%> of thy tender mercies פְּנֵ֣ה <S%H6437><s%> turn אֵלָֽי׃ <S%H413><s%> and do

וְאַל־ <S%H408><s%> not תַּסְתֵּ֣ר <S%H5641><s%> And hide פָּ֭נֶיךָ <S%H6440><s%> not thy face מֵֽעַבְדֶּ֑ךָ <S%H5650><s%> from thy servant כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> I am in צַר־ <S%H6887><s%> for I am in trouble לִ֝֗י מַהֵ֥ר <S%H4118><s%> me speedily עֲנֵֽנִי׃ <S%H6030><s%> hear

קָרְבָ֣ה <S%H7126><s%> Draw nigh אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to נַפְשִׁ֣י <S%H5315><s%> unto my soul גְאָלָ֑הּ <S%H1350><s%> [and] redeem לְמַ֖עַן <S%H4616><s%> because אֹיְבַ֣י <S%H341><s%> me because of mine enemies פְּדֵֽנִי׃ <S%H6299><s%> it deliver

אַתָּ֤ה <S%H859><s%> You יָדַ֗עְתָּ <S%H3045><s%> Thou hast known חֶרְפָּתִ֣י <S%H2781><s%> my reproach וּ֭בָשְׁתִּי <S%H1322><s%> and my shame וּכְלִמָּתִ֑י <S%H3639><s%> and my dishonour נֶ֝גְדְּךָ֗ <S%H5048><s%> are before כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> All צוֹרְרָֽי׃ <S%H6887><s%> mine adversaries

חֶרְפָּ֤ה ׀ <S%H2781><s%> Reproach שָֽׁבְרָ֥ה <S%H7665><s%> hath broken לִבִּ֗י <S%H3820><s%> my heart וָֽאָ֫נ֥וּשָׁה <S%H5136><s%> and I am full of heaviness וָאֲקַוֶּ֣ה <S%H6960><s%> and I looked לָנ֣וּד <S%H5110><s%> [for some] to take pity וָאַ֑יִן <S%H369><s%> there וְ֝לַמְנַחֲמִ֗ים <S%H5162><s%> but [there was] none and for comforters וְלֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> none מָצָֽאתִי׃ <S%H4672><s%> but I found

וַיִּתְּנ֣וּ <S%H5414><s%> They gave בְּבָרוּתִ֣י <S%H1267><s%> for my meat רֹ֑אשׁ <S%H7219><s%> me also gall וְ֝לִצְמָאִ֗י <S%H6772><s%> and in my thirst יַשְׁק֥וּנִי <S%H8248><s%> to drink חֹֽמֶץ׃ <S%H2558><s%> they gave me vinegar

יְהִֽי־ <S%H1961><s%> become שֻׁלְחָנָ֣ם <S%H7979><s%> Let their table לִפְנֵיהֶ֣ם <S%H6440><s%> before לְפָ֑ח <S%H6341><s%> become a snare וְלִשְׁלוֹמִ֥ים <S%H7965><s%> them and [that which should have been] for [their] welfare לְמוֹקֵֽשׁ׃ <S%H4170><s%> [let it become] a trap

תֶּחְשַׁ֣כְנָה <S%H2821><s%> be darkened עֵ֭ינֵיהֶם <S%H5869><s%> Let their eyes מֵרְא֑וֹת <S%H7200><s%> that they see וּ֝מָתְנֵ֗יהֶם <S%H4975><s%> not and make their loins תָּמִ֥יד <S%H8548><s%> continually הַמְעַֽד׃ <S%H4571><s%> to shake

שְׁפָךְ־ <S%H8210><s%> Pour out עֲלֵיהֶ֥ם <S%H5921><s%> out זַעְמֶ֑ךָ <S%H2195><s%> thine indignation וַחֲר֥וֹן <S%H2740><s%> upon them and let thy wrathful אַ֝פְּךָ֗ <S%H639><s%> anger יַשִּׂיגֵֽם׃ <S%H5381><s%> take hold

תְּהִי־ <S%H1961><s%> become טִֽירָתָ֥ם <S%H2918><s%> Let their habitation נְשַׁמָּ֑ה <S%H8074><s%> be desolate בְּ֝אָהֳלֵיהֶ֗ם <S%H168><s%> in their tents אַל־ <S%H408><s%> may none יְהִ֥י <S%H1961><s%> become יֹשֵֽׁב׃ <S%H3427><s%> [and] let none dwell

כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> for אַתָּ֣ה <S%H859><s%> Yourself אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> whom הִכִּ֣יתָ <S%H5221><s%> [him] whom thou hast smitten רָדָ֑פוּ <S%H7291><s%> For they persecute וְאֶל־ <S%H413><s%> of מַכְא֖וֹב <S%H4341><s%> to the grief חֲלָלֶ֣יךָ <S%H2491><s%> of those whom thou hast wounded יְסַפֵּֽרוּ׃ <S%H5608><s%> and they talk

תְּֽנָה־ <S%H5414><s%> Add עָ֭וֹן <S%H5771><s%> iniquity עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> unto עֲוֹנָ֑ם <S%H5771><s%> unto their iniquity וְאַל־ <S%H408><s%> not יָ֝בֹ֗אוּ <S%H935><s%> and let them not come בְּצִדְקָתֶֽךָ׃ <S%H6666><s%> into thy righteousness

יִ֭מָּחֽוּ <S%H4229><s%> Let them be blotted מִסֵּ֣פֶר <S%H5612><s%> out of the book חַיִּ֑ים <S%H2416><s%> of the living וְעִ֥ם <S%H5973><s%> with צַ֝דִּיקִ֗ים <S%H6662><s%> with the righteous אַל־ <S%H408><s%> not יִכָּתֵֽבוּ׃ <S%H3789><s%> and not be written

וַ֭אֲנִי <S%H589><s%> I עָנִ֣י <S%H6041><s%> But I [am] poor וְכוֹאֵ֑ב <S%H3510><s%> and sorrowful יְשׁוּעָתְךָ֖ <S%H3444><s%> let thy salvation אֱלֹהִ֣ים <S%H430><s%> O God תְּשַׂגְּבֵֽנִי׃ <S%H7682><s%> set me up on high

אֲהַֽלְלָ֣ה <S%H1984><s%> I will praise שֵׁם־ <S%H8034><s%> the name אֱלֹהִ֣ים <S%H430><s%> of God בְּשִׁ֑יר <S%H7892><s%> with a song וַאֲגַדְּלֶ֥נּוּ <S%H1431><s%> and will magnify בְתוֹדָֽה׃ <S%H8426><s%> him with thanksgiving

וְתִיטַ֣ב <S%H3190><s%> better לַֽ֭יהוָה <S%H3068><s%> the LORD מִשּׁ֥וֹר <S%H7794><s%> than an ox פָּ֗ר <S%H6499><s%> [or] bullock מַקְרִ֥ן <S%H7160><s%> that hath horns מַפְרִֽיס׃ <S%H6536><s%> and hoofs

רָא֣וּ <S%H7200><s%> shall see עֲנָוִ֣ים <S%H6035><s%> The humble יִשְׂמָ֑חוּ <S%H8055><s%> [this and] be glad דֹּרְשֵׁ֥י <S%H1875><s%> that seek אֱ֝לֹהִ֗ים <S%H430><s%> God וִיחִ֥י <S%H2421><s%> shall live לְבַבְכֶֽם׃ <S%H3824><s%> and your heart

כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> for שֹׁמֵ֣עַ <S%H8085><s%> heareth אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> about אֶבְיוֹנִ֣ים <S%H34><s%> the poor יְהוָ֑ה <S%H3068><s%> For the LORD וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> אֲ֝סִירָ֗יו <S%H615><s%> not his prisoners לֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> and does not בָזָֽה׃ <S%H959><s%> and despiseth

יְֽ֭הַלְלוּהוּ <S%H1984><s%> praise שָׁמַ֣יִם <S%H8064><s%> Let the heaven וָאָ֑רֶץ <S%H776><s%> and earth יַ֝מִּ֗ים <S%H3220><s%> him the seas וְֽכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> and everything רֹמֵ֥שׂ <S%H7430><s%> and every thing that moveth בָּֽם׃

כִּ֤י <S%H3588><s%> For אֱלֹהִ֨ים ׀ <S%H430><s%> For God י֘וֹשִׁ֤יעַ <S%H3467><s%> will save צִיּ֗וֹן <S%H6726><s%> Zion וְ֭יִבְנֶה <S%H1129><s%> and will build עָרֵ֣י <S%H5892><s%> the cities יְהוּדָ֑ה <S%H3063><s%> of Judah וְיָ֥שְׁבוּ <S%H3427><s%> that they may dwell שָׁ֝֗ם <S%H8033><s%> there וִירֵשֽׁוּהָ׃ <S%H3423><s%> there and have it in possession

וְזֶ֣רַע <S%H2233><s%> The seed עֲ֭בָדָיו <S%H5650><s%> also of his servants יִנְחָל֑וּהָ <S%H5157><s%> shall inherit וְאֹהֲבֵ֥י <S%H157><s%> it and they that love שְׁ֝מ֗וֹ <S%H8034><s%> his name יִשְׁכְּנוּ־ <S%H7931><s%> shall dwell בָֽהּ׃
